info:eu-repo/classification/acm/D.2.2 Design Tools and Techniques
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The basic MIDAS platform and the integrated test evaluation, planning and scheduling macro-component: This deliverable includes the basic MIDAS PaaS with mechanisms to manage the Cloud infrastructure and to provide the requested functionality and reports a planning for the activities performed in the task T6.2, T6.3 and T.6.4. The deliverable will include also a first demonstrator of the integrated test execution macro-component.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: info:eu-repo/grantAgreement/EC/FP7/318786/EU/Model and Inference Driven, Automated testing of Services architectures/MIDAS
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Model and Inference Driven, Automated testing of Services architectures. Deliverable D6.3, 2014.
